sql_templates.error_summary_main_query:
WITH LatestDevices AS (
            -- 步骤1: 找出每个device_code对应的最新的、有效的device_id
            SELECT id AS device_id, device_code, customer_id
            FROM (
                SELECT id, device_code, customer_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY device_code ORDER BY create_time DESC, id DESC) AS rn
                FROM t_device
                WHERE del_status = 1 AND device_code IS NOT NULL AND device_code != ''
            ) AS RankedDevices
            WHERE rn = 1
        ),
        StartInventory AS (
            -- 步骤2 (已优化): 确立“绝对期初库存”。利用设备的创建日期避免不必要的历史数据查询。
            SELECT
                ld.device_id,
                CASE
                    -- 优化点：如果设备是在查询开始后才创建的，其期初库存必为0。
                    WHEN d.create_time >= '{start_date_str} 00:00:00' THEN 0
                    -- 否则，才需要去历史订单中查找期初库存。
                    ELSE COALESCE((
                        SELECT o.avai_oil
                        FROM t_device_oil_order o
                        WHERE o.device_id = ld.device_id AND o.order_time < '{start_date_str} 00:00:00'
                        ORDER BY o.order_time DESC
                        LIMIT 1
                    ), 0)
                END AS start_inventory_val
            FROM LatestDevices ld
            JOIN t_device d ON ld.device_id = d.id -- 必须关联设备表以获取create_time
        ),
        InventoryEvents AS (
            -- 步骤3: 构建包含“绝对期初库存”的完整库存事件流
            SELECT device_id, CAST('{start_date_str} 00:00:00' AS DATETIME) as order_time, 0 as oil_val, start_inventory_val as avai_oil
            FROM StartInventory
            UNION ALL
            SELECT o.device_id, o.order_time, o.oil_val, o.avai_oil
            FROM t_device_oil_order o
            JOIN LatestDevices ld ON o.device_id = ld.device_id
            WHERE o.order_time >= '{start_date_str} 00:00:00' AND o.order_time <= '{end_date_str} 23:59:59' AND o.status = 1
        ),
        PeriodAggregates AS (
            -- 步骤4: 在完整的事件流上计算总加油量、期末库存和总订单量
            SELECT
                device_id,
                SUM(GREATEST(0, avai_oil - prev_avai_oil)) AS total_refill,
                (SELECT avai_oil FROM (SELECT avai_oil, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY device_id ORDER BY order_time DESC) as rn FROM InventoryEvents i WHERE i.device_id = p.device_id) t WHERE t.rn = 1) AS end_inventory,
                SUM(oil_val) AS total_order_volume
            FROM (
                SELECT device_id, order_time, oil_val, avai_oil, LAG(avai_oil, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY device_id ORDER BY order_time) AS prev_avai_oil
                FROM InventoryEvents
            ) p
            GROUP BY device_id
        )
        -- 步骤5: 最终计算
        SELECT
            ld.device_code,
            c.customer_name,
            agg.total_order_volume,
            (si.start_inventory_val - agg.end_inventory + agg.total_refill) AS total_inventory_consumption
        FROM
            PeriodAggregates agg
        JOIN
            LatestDevices ld ON agg.device_id = ld.device_id
        JOIN
            t_customer c ON ld.customer_id = c.id
        JOIN
            StartInventory si ON agg.device_id = si.device_id
        WHERE c.status = 1
        HAVING
            (total_order_volume IS NOT NULL AND total_inventory_consumption IS NOT NULL) AND
            ABS(total_inventory_consumption - total_order_volume) > 0.01
sql_templates.error_summary_offline_query:
WITH LatestDevices AS (
            -- 步骤1: 找出每个device_code对应的最新的、有效的device_id
            SELECT 
                id as device_id, 
                device_code,
                customer_id
            FROM (
                SELECT 
                    id, 
                    device_code, 
                    customer_id,
                    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY device_code ORDER BY create_time DESC, id DESC) as rn
                FROM t_device
                WHERE del_status = 1 AND device_code IS NOT NULL AND device_code != ''
            ) AS RankedDevices
            WHERE rn = 1
        )
        SELECT
            ld.device_code,
            f.create_time,
            f.recovery_time,
            f.biz_type
        FROM
            t_device_fault_detail f
        JOIN
            LatestDevices ld ON f.device_id = ld.device_id
        WHERE
            f.fault_type = 9999
            AND f.create_time <= %s
            AND (f.recovery_time IS NULL OR f.recovery_time >= %s)
